alliances.short_description: One Tap. Happy Customers.
alliances.full_description:
Mobile Number is the native identity in markets like India and many such growth markets around the world!  Phone Number identity is also a critical identity for verification across a spectrum of user journeys in digital and mobile products catering to emerging and developed markets alike.

 

Truecaller SDK enables instantly to signup/ login/ verify/register users in 3rd party mobile apps and web products via their verified mobile number-based identity on Truecaller, without the need of any cumbersome OTP(One Time Password) SMS based verification whatsoever! It is also an OTP less flow!

 

Cowrks and Truecaller join hands to bring this to you at No cost. Yes you read that right.

 

 

250+ leading digital brands and startups in India like Grofers, 1mg, OYO, FreshMenu, Zoomcar, Voonik, MagicBricks, IndiaMart, Housejoy, Lendingkart, BankBazaar, PVR Cinemas and many more, are already leveraging Truecaller SDK across their mobile apps and web based products across use cases for frictionless user on-boarding or phone number verification or in checkout flows! In turn driving further user growth in a more secured and trusted manner.

alliances.short_description: Love Food? How about Beer? Here's a reason to love them more!
alliances.full_description:
Hey there!

You've got yourself a fairy godmother! You have been hand-picked by ​CoWrks and the team at Quirk to experience something new and wildly interesting!

What do I get? You get a brand new Quirk Card for Re.1 for the first month and Rs 199/month post that. Specially Curated for Cowrks Members!

Woohoo! Wait...What's that? The Quirk Card is Bangalore's new urban essential, a city pass that makes your meals happier, your nights drunker and your parties jazzier! How, you ask? By giving you a flat 25% Off on any Food & Alcohol bills at the 65 of the best pubs & restaurants in Bangalore. At all times of the day and all days of the week. That's how!

Some of the top restaurants you can use your Quirk Card at are The Fatty Bao, Big Brewsky, Monkey Bar, Loft38, Barleyz, The Hole in the Wall Cafe and many more!

The Quirk card has over ​6​000 active users who save an average of Rs. 1200 per month while eating out. Users also get additional lifestyle perks worth over Rs. 5000 from  Freshmenu, Gaana, Raw Pressery, Zoomcar and Jean-Claude Biguine Salons and Spas - for free!

Woah! How do I use this?  Simply present your card to the restaurant before your bill is made to avail of the discount. You can also download our app on Android or iOS  to use your digital Quirk Card. Check out https://www.lequirk.com for more details!

And? Once your Quirk Card is activated, you will also receive a few interesting emails from the team at Quirk, letting you know about your Quirk Card Usage, any new Restaurant partners that come on board, your Perks code, the best posts from LeQuirk Blog that month and more.

What happens after it expires? We know you'll love the Quirk Card and come back for more! You can simply renew your card or get a new one here!

alliances.short_description: Accounts team - How about some peace of mind when your employees travel?
alliances.full_description:
Happay is a prepaid VISA card for business expenses; the USP being that it can be completely controlled using a web or mobile interface. You can issue cards to all employees who are spending on company’s behalf and then control exactly where your money is spent by defining spending policies, setting spend limits and configuring notifications. Here’s the best part, you also get real time visibility into all expenses, even before the employees have submitted expense reports.

For the employees, the whole hassle of requesting for advance repeatedly, maintaining receipts, remembering to record all expenses and spending hours on creating expense reports is eliminated. All the transactions done using the HappayCard (accepted at all VISA POS online and offline) are automatically recorded in the Happay mobile app. They can click a picture of the receipt and tag it to the respective expense, select expenses based on trips and submit them for approval to the manager. 

Finally, all the expenses can be seamlessly imported into the accounting software, therefore reducing manual data entry and the possibility of human error.

 

Kindly look at the explainer video.

Happay exclusive offer to Cowrks members-

Happay offers 1 month free Trial for Cowrks members 

15% off Happay Commercials.

alliances.full_description:

WaaS is the vibrant new hardware company that helps you and your team on the latest specifications so that work gets done faster, agile and more importantly reduce your hardware spend. Make outright purchases of Apple, Dell, Hp, Lenovo and many more at the prices you have never seen before and get multi brand support all at one place.

Cowrks & WaaS brings to you discounts of more than 10% on your hardware requirements.

Be Tech Savvy!
alliances.redeem_details: Email alliances@cowrks.com with the requirement for the best quote.
